item.title: James add a quote by Roddy Doyle
item.description: "It was frightening, though, how little time you got. You only became yourself when you were twenty-three or twenty-four. A few years later, you had an old man's chest hair. It wasn't worth it." -- Roddy Doyle

item.title: James add a quote by Jonathan Lethem
item.description: "The whole state of Maine is unlocked." -- Jonathan Lethem

item.title: James add a quote by Toby Barlow
item.description: "You take a shower, your head is up, far away from everything, lost in the clouds, but down in the tub, man, you know who you are." -- Toby Barlow

item.title: James add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description: "I am at the moment writing a lengthy indictment against our century. When my brain begins to reel from my literary labors, I make an occasional cheese dip." -- John Kennedy Toole

item.title: James add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description: "The day before me is fraught with God knows what horrors." -- John Kennedy Toole

item.title: James add a quote by Aminatta Forna
item.description: "There's something uncomfortable about looking at pictures of your parents at a time when they made each other happy." -- Aminatta Forna

item.title: James add a quote by Darko Macan
item.description: "Nice bedtime story, mate. Wish I'd heard more of 'em. Might've ended up a better man." -- Darko Macan
